name: css-peak-pro
description: Enhanced CSS Peak extension with smart scoping that shows only relevant CSS for elements based on configurable modes - Smart, Global, Folder, or Filename matching

üéØ Scoping Mode: Choose how CSS files are discovered

‚Ä¢ Global: Search entire workspace
‚Ä¢ Folder: Same directory only
